page.title: 11Devon County Show,Exford
page.content: Every year my family goes to Devon County Show,I hadn't been before.We decided to go on Friday because it is not so busy.We arrived at the big field near Exeter and walked up the dusty track.First we had an ice-cream, then watched the horses.After that we had dinner in a tent.Next we saw the goats and sheep parade in the ring. Then it was the hounds turn,they mixed them up together.The Exford huntsman couldn't ride his own horse because it hadn't had an injection.I wanted to buy the dogs a lead,Mummy said that I could if they were under Â£1 but I didn't find one.I had some sweets and lemon, then we all met by the ring at 6.00 o'clock.We had a big cooked tea when we got back to Nans and then went straight to bed.
